flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 600 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=600>>600
The total guesses of the first three is 1050 because 100 + 800 + 600 = <<100+800+600=1050>>1050
The average of the first three guesses is 350 because 1050 / 3 = <<1050/3=350>>350
The fourth student guessed 375 because 350 + 25 = <<350+25=375>>375
#### 375

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 1050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
